name: Allow Demo
description:
Welcome to the early demo for Allow!

There's no real objective, the current purpose is to just see if the core movement systems feel fun. I recommend just to naturally explore the levels. Any feedback would be greaty appreciated!

Keyboard Controls:
Move left/right: A/D OR Left/Right arrow keys
Jump: W OR Up arrow key
Dash Roll: Space bar
Fall down faster when in the air: S or Down key
Zoom map out for a better view: Control (CTRL)
Generate a new level: R

Controller Controls:
Move left/right: Left Stick
Jump: A button
Dash Roll: B button
Fall down faster when in the air: Down on left stick
Zoom map out for a better view: Left bumper
Generate a new level: Select

Tips:
-Jump and Dash Roll power can be fine tuned by quickly releasing their buttons after pressing them.
-Once you grab onto a wall, the only way off is to jump, roll, or slide all the way down.
-You get to use one jump and one roll in the air each.
-By timing your jumps and rolls while still moving fast, you can preserve a lot of your momentum.

NOTE: If you're here from ludum dare 45, please follow this link https://msciortino17.itch.io/allowld45
